author: MiniWarGaming
description:
This video dives into why Zone Mortalis–style interior boards are some of the most cinematic and engaging ways to play tabletop wargames. I break down what makes tight corridors, doors, terminals, and confined firefights so thrilling, share my history with Forge World’s original tiles, revisit classic interior campaigns, and show how we built a massive board using our upcoming Depths of Perdition 3D-printable tile system. If you love narrative play, close-quarters action, and immersive sci-fi environments, you’ll enjoy this deep look into interior terrain design and gameplay.

🔥 *WIN A FULLY PRE-PAINTED INTERIOR WARGAMING TABLE!* 🔥
We’re giving away *2 complete pre-painted Depths of Perdition boards* — shipped anywhere in the world.

👉 *Enter here:* https://www.miniwargaming.com/perdition

*Important Links*

title: The Hidden Genius of Zone Mortalis

author: MiniWarGaming

title: Watch Me Build a DUNGEON MASTERPIECE in Minutes!
